existing_features.title: Increase the maximum file upload size limit from 2MB to 20MB for all file types in the frontend upload validation
Add a warning message on the upload page that appears when users select or drag files larger than 15MB, informing them that the upload might take longer
Update the file size limit text displayed on the upload page from '2MB' to '20MB' to reflect the new limit

new_feature_requests.summary: Increase file upload limit from 2MB to 20MB for all file types
Add warning message for files larger than 15MB
Update the backend chunk size handling and storage to accommodate files up to 20MB, ensuring the existing 500KB chunk size can handle the larger total file size
